document.full_text: judge kermit bye made his comments on friday as the n.f.l. and its players faced off in a federal appeals court to determine how much longer the lockout can last.
document.title: judge advises n.f.l. and players to continue efforts to end dispute
lines_and_colors: judge kermit bye made his comments on friday as the n.f.l. and its players faced off in a federal appeals court to determine how much longer the lockout can last.
